purpose: To demonstrate the successful application of a program approach.
title: The approach has been successfully applied

bullets.text: We tested the approach in two well-established SOS CV programme locations: Hawassa, Ethiopia, and Mbabane, Swaziland.
The approach worked well and is a good framework for future assessment. We even learnt how to further improve the methodology.
While we were impressed by the impact we are having in these locations, areas for development were identified to further improve our work.

reasoning_strategy: Use of case studies and direct outcomes to validate the method
